title: Application Security Advocate
bio: Dustin started his career as a software engineer and application architect before moving into cybersecurity leadership. Today, he focuses on building security programs that drive real behavior change, using psychology, motivation, and gamification to create strong security cultures. Heâ€™s led major security initiatives at companies like Staples and Fivetran, and now, as co-founder of Katilyst, works with security and engineering teams to build effective Security Champion programs that make security a business enabler.
